title: How have light bulbs changed over time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is this the beginning of a joke? “How many (insert stereotype here) does it take to change a light bulb?” They won’t change themselves, you know. How have light bulbs changed over time?
One way is from incandescent to fluorescent to CFL to LED.Another way is in filament construction, glass type and gas content.Yet another way is in shape and connection type.
